      public static void addEmployee(String firstName, String surname, String address, int phone, double salary, boolean isPersonalTrainer)
      Name: addEmployee Purpose/description: This method is used to create a new employee object and add it to the employees array list .

      surname - variable that holds the employee's surname
      address - variable that holds the employee's address
      phone - variable that holds the employee's phone
      salary - variable that holds the employee's salary
      isPersonalTrainer - variable that indicates if the employee is a personal trainer

      lName - variable that holds the employee's surname
      address - variable that holds the employee's address

      phone - variable that holds the employee's phone

    • deleteEmployee

      public static boolean deleteEmployee(int empID)
      Name: deleteEmployee Purpose/description: This method is used to delete an employee object from the system and remove it from the employees list. Before the employee object is deleted the method checks if the employee is personal trainer and remove the members that are assigned to it.
      Parameters:
      empID - variable that holds the employee's ID.
      Returns:
      deleted - Boolean that indicates that employee object has been deleted or not.

    • deleteMember

      public static boolean deleteMember(int memberID)
      Name: deleteMember Purpose/description: This method is used to delete a member object from the system and remove it from the members list. Before the member object is deleted the method checks if the member has a personal trainer then the member object is removed from the members list of the PT .
      Parameters:
      memberID - variable that holds the member's ID.
      Returns:
      deleted - Boolean that indicates that member object has been deleted or not.

    • assignPtToMember

      public static boolean assignPtToMember(int memberID, int ptID)
      Name: assignPtToMember Purpose/description: This method is used to assign a member to a personal trainer. Before the assignment,this method checks if the member is assigned to a Pt or not.
      Parameters:
      memberID - variable that holds the member's ID.
      ptID - variable that holds the personal trainer's ID.
      Returns:
      assigned - Boolean that indicated if the member is assigned to a PT or not .

    • removePtFromMember

      public static boolean removePtFromMember(int memberID)
      Name: removePtFromMember Purpose/description: This method is used to remove a personal trainer from a member. Before the removal ,this method checks if the member is assigned to a Pt or not.
      Parameters:
      memberID - variable that holds the member's ID.
      Returns:
      removed - Boolean that indicated if the PT is removed from a member .

      Returns:

    • generateMarketingReport

      public static void generateMarketingReport()
      Name: generateMarketingReport Purpose/description: The method is used to create text file in Project folder that contains information about gym members. It will first display Staff members information and then Student members information.
